document_data.name: Map House
document_data.mainbody: '''Map House''' was the guildhall of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian guild]] known as the [[Surveyors', Map & Chart-Makers' Guild]].<ref>
document_data.Location: The Map House was located along [[Waterdeep Way]], in the [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]]. It neighbored the [[Fellowship Hall]] and [[House of Shyrrhr]].<ref>
document_data.Services: A large collection of [[map]]s and nautical charts was maintained in this building by the Surveyors', Map & Chart-Makers' Guild. From here one could sell maps or purchase them at 25 [[gold piece]] each. They also offered nine day delivery to any address in Waterdeep, as well as two day delivery for double the price.
document_data.Reputation: Like other guildhalls in the Castle Ward, the Map House was considered by locals to be a landmark.
